mapper.sql: id, mqGroup, mqTopic, mqBody, executeParams, failedReason, executeUrl, mqBornhost, mqBorntimestamp, instanceId, processTimestamp, httpMethod, retryTimes, retryReponse, status, ctime, utime
mapper.select: SELECT id,mqTopic, executeUrl FROM m_schedule_failedflow WHERE status=1 AND (TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(ctime)) <=1
